price: Nítorí náà, ó sọ àwọn ènìyàn rẹ̀ di òpè. Wọ́n sì tẹ̀lé e. Dájúdájú wọ́n jẹ́ ìjọ òbìlẹ̀jẹ́.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭāʿūhu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
